import { DiningSharp } from '@mui/icons-material' import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' function AddDish() { const [dish, setDish] = useState({ name: "", desc: "", category: "", subcategory: "", price: 0, status: "ACTIVE" }); const handleDishInput = () => event => { const key = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setDish({ ...dish, [key]: value }); } return (
